title: Public Health Leadership in Practice
description: In preparation for the MPH practicum, MPH students are required to enroll in this course, which will prepare students to be active members of their field site. This course seeks to expose students to leadership principles to be proactive and effective in their careers by utilizing a blend of reflective individual and group-based activities that employ written and oral communication skills. In addition, seminars will address key issues and current trends in the workplace. Prerequisites: must be enrolled in MPH program.
